title: The Itchen Bridge
text:
The 22nd of March 2024 marked 50 years since work began to construct the Itchen Bridge (Robertson 1976; Nicholson and Robertson 1977).
Southampton Museums & Archive page on the floating bridge as part of their Southampton Stories collection.
Song from 1977 the Woolston Ferry Gutta Percher & Balladeers on YouTube which references the Lowry painting.
